stories.headline: And the winner is
stories.summary: Pulitzer Prize-winning journalists share their computer-assisted reporting tips that helped them succeed in investigative journalism.

stories.headline: Crash Test Disaster on Deadline
stories.summary: Newsday's newsroom used computer-assisted reporting to cover the TWA 800 crash under tight deadlines, analyzing FAA safety databases.

stories.headline: Troubled Housing Probing HUD woes
stories.summary: Investigation into HUD's Indian housing program revealed financial mismanagement and exploitation, highlighting deregulation issues.

stories.headline: Hook, line & Pulitzer CAR catches big fish
stories.summary: An investigative series explored global and local fisheries issues, demonstrating the interconnected economic web and environmental impacts.

stories.headline: Crime watch Investigating crime statistics
stories.summary: An investigation into Florida's crime statistics revealed discrepancies in data due to non-reporting by police agencies.
